Props.Name: Class
Props.Description: The class applied to the outermost element of the component

Props.Name: Height
Props.Description: Sets the height for the component.

Props.Name: Items
Props.Description: The array of items to display

Props.Name: MaxHeight
Props.Description: Sets the maximum height for the component.

Props.Name: MaxWidth
Props.Description: Sets the maximum width for the component.

Props.Name: MinHeight
Props.Description: Sets the minimum height for the component.

Props.Name: MinWidth
Props.Description: Sets the minimum width for the component.

Props.Name: OverscanCount
Props.Description: The number of extra items rendered before and after the visible area

Props.Name: Style
Props.Description: The style applied to the outermost element of the component

Props.Name: Width
Props.Description: Sets the width for the component.
